snippet: The rise of new banking-focused start-ups like Number26 is forcing traditional players like Deutsche Bank and JPMorgan Chase to respond to people’s desire to access financial services through their smartphones.
abstract: The rise of new banking-focused start-ups like Number26 is forcing traditional players like Deutsche Bank and JPMorgan Chase to respond to people’s desire to access financial services through their smartphones.

headline.main: Number26, German Banking Start-Up, Expands Across Europe
